value.title: StarCraft 2 - Beginner Protoss Opening | The PiG Daily #155
value.excerpt: THIS WEEKS ICYFAR Challenge: "Feinting Attacks" - A feint is where you give the impression of attacking in one place where its fake or just a small distraction from the real thrust of your attack. value.excerpt: "Blood Sacrifice" a unit has to die every minute of the game. Submit replays to eonblu95@gmail.com as attachment. Latest submission is before the monday(US/EU) / tuesday(AUS) daily. (Note: You may need to kill one or two of your own workers in the earlygame to appease the gods) Full Playlist of Daily

value.title: Map Control + Positioning - Beginner Basics Daily #97
value.excerpt: THIS WEEKS ICYFAR: Send through your replays playing “Knife Fight in a Phone Booth - You can't go above 40 workers ever”. The more back and forth or creative the better! Send submissions to eonblu95@gmail.com as attachment AND only ICYFAR as title! Lastest submission until the second daily of the week.
